## Transformer\_2 type

Transforms an object after it is created but before it is returned to the requestor.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Transformer<K> = (instance: Resolved<K>) => Resolved<K>;
```
**References:** [Resolved](../fast-element.resolved/)
